title: Slayer task/Dagannoths

properties.name: description
properties.value: Dagannoths are a slayer task assigned by the advanced slayer masters.  Requiring completion of Horror from the Deep to be assigned, Dagannoths are known for their high slayer experience rates and easy task completions.  For players who are seeking a more difficult challenge, the Dagannoth Kings are a viable alternative for players of moderate to experienced combat ability.

Dagannoths

SkillsNone

Advanced data
Icon IDNo

Dagannoths are a slayer task assigned by the advanced slayer masters. Requiring completion of Horror from the Deep to be assigned, Dagannoths are known for their high slayer experience rates and easy task completions. For players who are seeking a more difficult challenge, the Dagannoth Kings are a viable alternative for players of moderate to experienced combat ability.

The weaker variant of Dagannoths can be found within the Lighthouse basement, Jormungand's Prison, and the Catacombs of Kourend. In the first two locations, a dwarf cannon can be used very effectively as the area is multicombat. Little food or prayer potions are required. Within the Catacombs of Kourend, players can use prayer equipment and a bonecrusher to limit or negate the need for prayer potions.

For players seeking a more rewarding experience, Dagannoth Kings are also a great way to complete the task. The benefits of a slayer helm or black mask can be used to help speed up kills, especially for those who are lower levelled and are seeking to kill all three kings. Players can also, with careful setup, isolate Dagannoth Rex and use a safespot for easy kills.

Finally, players can use a Dagannoth task as an opportunity to train prayer through use of the Expert Reanimation spell on the Arceuus spellbook. Casting this spell on an ensouled dagannoth head within range of the Dark Altar will summon a Reanimated Dagannoth, which can be killed for 936 prayer experience and 35 slayer experience.

Monster Variants[edit | edit source]

Monster Combat level Slayer XP Locations Notes
Dagannoth 74

92

70

120

  • Catacombs of Kourend
  • Jormungand's Prison
  • Lighthouse
  • Much weaker than their combat level suggests.
  • Some of the level 74 Dagannoths attack with range, while the others attack with melee.
Dagannoth spawn 42 35
  • Waterbirth Island Dungeon
  • Much weaker than their combat level suggests.
  • Will always be aggressive to the player.
  • Not recommended for a slayer task as the regular Dagannoth provide more experience with only a slight increase in difficulty.
Dagannoth fledgeling 70 0
  • Waterbirth Island Dungeon
  • Only located in the room that contains Bardur, where he endlessly fights the fledgelings.
  • Gives no combat or slayer experience, and only drops bones as well as brimstone keys if slain as part of a Konar quo Maten.
Dagannoth Prime

Dagannoth Rex

Dagannoth Supreme

303 331.5

331.5

255

  • Deep within the Waterbirth Island Dungeon
  • The three kings attack with their own combat style, and are usually fought together instead of separately.
  • Typically only fought on task to take advantage of the benefits of the slayer helm or black mask.
  • Can drop some of the best drops for the ring slot, specifically the Seers ring, Berserker ring, and Archers ring.
Reanimated Dagannoth N/A 35
  • Dark Altar
  • Other (see notes)
  • Casting the reanimate dagannoth spell on an ensouled dagannoth head will summon a Reanimated Dagannoth, which can be killed for 936 prayer experience and 35 slayer experience.
  • If the spell is not cast within a reasonable amount of time of picking up the head, or if the player trades the head or teleports away, then the user will need to reanimate the heads at the Dark Altar in Kourend.

Location Comparison[edit | edit source]

 This article is currently in the middle of an expansion or major revamping.
The information contained within it should not be considered fully accurate and/or complete. You can help by contributing to it.
Location Maplink Amount Multicombat Cannonable Safespotable Notes
Catacombs of Kourend 14 Dagannoth Yes No Yes
  • The dagannoth are located in the southern section of the Catacombs of Kourend.
Jormungand's Prison 49 Dagannoth Yes Yes Yes
  • Only accessible after completing The Fremennik Exiles.
  • Common location for cannoning dagannoth.
  • Dagannoths here only use melee attacks making prayer easier to use.
Lighthouse Dungeon 22 Dagannoth Yes Yes Yes
  • Usually busy with players using a dwarf cannon.
  • Can offer some of the fastest slayer experience in the game.
Waterbirth Island Dungeon 93 Dagannoth

3 Dagannoth Kings

Yes Yes See Notes
  • The dagannoth here are much stronger than variants found elsewhere.
  • Reaching the Dagannoth Kings requires extra preparation.

Exceptions[edit | edit source]

  • Dagannoth mother, when fought in the quest Horror from the Deep and when refought in the Nightmare Zone, does not count towards a Dagannoth task.

[[Dagannoth]]s are a slayer task assigned by the advanced slayer masters.  Requiring completion of [[Horror from the Deep]] to be assigned, Dagannoths are known for their high slayer experience rates and easy task completions.  For players who are seeking a more difficult challenge, the [[Dagannoth Kings]] are a viable alternative for players of moderate to experienced combat ability.

The weaker variant of Dagannoths can be found within the [[Lighthouse]] basement, [[Jormungand's Prison]], and the [[Catacombs of Kourend]].  In the first two locations, a [[Dwarf Cannon|dwarf cannon]] can be used very effectively as the area is multicombat.  Little food or prayer potions are required.  Within the Catacombs of Kourend, players can use prayer equipment and a [[bonecrusher]] to limit or negate the need for prayer potions.

For players seeking a more rewarding experience, [[Dagannoth Kings]] are also a great way to complete the task.  The benefits of a slayer helm or black mask can be used to help speed up kills, especially for those who are lower levelled and are seeking to kill all three kings.  Players can also, with careful setup, isolate [[Dagannoth Rex]] and use a safespot for easy kills.

Finally, players can use a Dagannoth task as an opportunity to train prayer through use of the [[Expert Reanimation|Expert Reanimation spell]] on the [[Arceuus spells|Arceuus spellbook]].  Casting this spell on an [[ensouled dagannoth head]] within range of the [[Dark Altar]] will summon a [[Reanimated dagannoth|Reanimated Dagannoth]], which can be killed for 936 prayer experience and 35 slayer experience.
